awards.title: Global Citizenship Award
awards.description: Honors HEIs that foster global awareness, intercultural understanding, and responsible leadership.

awards.title: Outstanding International Education Program Award
awards.description: Recognizes programs that advance international learning, academic exchange, and inclusive global education.

awards.title: Sustainability Award
awards.description: Rewards initiatives promoting sustainable development and environmental responsibility in international education.

awards.title: Best ASEAN Awareness Initiative Award
awards.description: Recognizes initiatives that strengthen ASEAN identity, awareness, and collaboration.

awards.title: Emerging Leadership Award
awards.description: Recognizes promising leaders who demonstrate potential and early impact in internationalization and collaboration.

awards.title: Internationalization Leadership Award
awards.description: Honors executives and officials who have shown strategic, ethical, and sustained leadership in advancing internationalization.

awards.title: Best CHED Regional Office for Internationalization Award
awards.description: Honors CHED Regional Offices that promote internationalization policies and coordination within their region.

awards.title: Most Promising Regional IRO Community Award
awards.description: Recognizes IRO communities that demonstrate outstanding collaboration and initiative in internationalization.
